channel.title: OOP News
channel.description: Get the lowdown on OOP and PHP.

item.title: Stumped for something to say
item.description: Well, so much for a brilliant start. My mind has gone a blank.

item.title: The blog starts here!
item.description: The world has been waiting with bated breath, but the wait is over... It's time to dazzle the blogosphere with my dazzling wit. Stay tuned.

item.title: Oopsa-daisy!
item.description: Now the truth can finally be told... The original title for my book was "Object-Oriented PHP Solutions", but OOPS didn't sound quite right.

item.title: Only two chapters to go
item.description: It's been a long haul, but the end is almost in sight. I hope everyone has enjoyed this journey through OOP as much as I have writing it.
